ygData.subject: Re: Re: Box of Akbar (Was RE: New Patch)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is not a data problem, but would involve entirely new coding, if the ability is not already in the game. This is a new feature. ... Why not? If you re
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Sep 1999, Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> Semi related to the post below, (It would of taken care of the situation
> with low level mobs dropping the box.) why dont they put level limits on
> items. In other words, you cant use the BOX unless you are level 30+.
> That sure would take care of twinking.

This is not a data problem, but would involve entirely new coding, if the
ability is not already in the game. This is a new feature.

> With that said, I dont think they should make items that only low levels
> can wear, just limit the level at which you can start using an item.

Why not?
If you're going to hav level limits, seems to me it should work both ways.
